bibl.title: A.H.M. Jones, The Roman Economy. Studies in Ancient Economic and Administrative History (Oxford, 1974) pp. 257-262.
bibl.note: Reproduit de: Journal of Ecclesiastical History 5 (1954) pp. 196-200. - P. Lond. III, 878 descr. (= S.B. VI, 9217-9218) confirms the authenticity of one of the Constantinian edicts cited by Eusebius. The papyrus is a contemporary copy of the Letter of A.D. 324. - Pp. 261-262: Appendix by T.C.S.: Palaeographical note; - Note on the restoration of the text.
bibl.seg: Jones A.H.M., Notes on the Genuineness of the Constantinian Documents in Eusebius' Life of Constantine. Appendix by T.C. Skeat.
A.H.M. Jones, The Roman Economy. Studies in Ancient Economic and Administrative History (Oxford, 1974) pp. 257-262.
